page.title: 17 **EMPLOYMENT**
page.content: From interviews I found that people came to {PRESTATYN}because of its tourist attractions - the arcades,the beaches and amusements. Some people moved to {PRESTATYN}because where they used to live was unpleasant.Others moved to {PRESTATYN}because it is more convenient for them to travel to work. I carried out a survey about Mums and Dads and work asking children in my class if their Mums or Dads work in {PRESTATYN}and if so where. More Mums work in {PRESTATYN}than Dads.Most Dads work outside{PRESTATYN}but some Dads are unemployed. I think that most women can't get to work outside PRESTATYN because they haven't got transport.
